text: Occupy Pedophilia was a far-right, neo-Nazi vigilante group founded by Maxim Martsinkevich in Russia in the early 2010s. Occupy Pedophilia is well known as a hate group whose activities fueled violence and harassment against LGBT people in Russia and other countries. A documentary Hunted: The War Against Gays in Russia reflects on Occupy Pedophilia. The group inspired similar vigilante movements abroad, such as in Spain. Category:Nazism Category:Russia Category:Political organizations
title: Occupy Pedophilia
